title: Total number of gang-related homicides in the United States 2012
summary: In general Total number of homicides has stayed the same over the Year.
Total number of homicides is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2009, and lastly roughly constant from 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Total number of homicides, of value 2083.0 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Total number of homicides about 1659.0 was reached at Year 2008
min_summary: Overall Total number of homicides has increased over the Year.
Total number of homicides is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2009, and lastly roughly constant from 2009 to 2010.
